trans-unit.source: Specifies that the public member value be serialized by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> as an encoded SOAP XML element.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o valor do membro público ser serializado pelo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>como um elemento XML de SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The SoapElementAttribute class belongs to a family of attributes that controls how the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes or deserializes an object as encoded SOAP XML.
trans-unit.target: A classe de SoapElementAttribute pertence a uma família de atributos que controla a forma como o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>serializa ou deserializes um objeto como XML de SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The resulting XML conforms to section 5 of the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "Simple Object Access Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".
trans-unit.target: O XML resultante está em conformidade com a secção 5 do documento Consortium World Wide Web (www.w3.org), "Simple objeto acesso Protocol (SOAP) 1.1".

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of similar attributes, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista completa dos atributos semelhantes, consulte [atributos que controlo codificadas SOAP serialização](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: To serialize an object as an encoded SOAP message, you must construct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> created with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: Para serializar um objeto como uma mensagem SOAP codificado, deve construir a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>utilizar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping>criado com o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A>método de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter>classe.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapReflectionImporter.ImportTypeMapping%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeMapping> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: Apply the SoapElementAttribute to a public field to direct the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize the field as an encoded SOAP XML element.
trans-unit.target: Aplicar o SoapElementAttribute a um campo público para direcionar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>para serializar o campo como um elemento XML de SOAP codificado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a utilização de atributos, consulte [atributos](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"></xref> class and specifies the name of the XML element.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute"> </xref> classe e especifica o nome do elemento XML.

trans-unit.source: The XML element name of the serialized member.
trans-unit.target: O nome de elemento XML do membro serializado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) data type of the generated XML element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o tipo de dados do esquema XML definição idioma (XSD) do elemento XML gerado.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the XML Schema simple data types with their .NET equivalents.
trans-unit.target: A tabela seguinte lista os tipos de dados simples de esquema XML com os respetivos equivalentes de .NET.

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `base64Binary` and `hexBinary` data types, use an array of <xref:System.Byte> structures, and apply a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> with the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> set to "base64Binary" or "hexBinary", as appropriate.
trans-unit.target: Para o esquema XML `base64Binary` e `hexBinary` tipos de dados, utilize uma matriz de <xref:System.Byte>estruturas e aplicar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>com o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A>definido como "base64Binary" ou "hexBinary", conforme apropriado.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapAttributeAttribute.DataType%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: For the XML Schema `time` and `date` data types, use the <xref:System.DateTime> type and apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> with the DataType set to "date" or "time".
trans-unit.target: Para o esquema XML `time` e `date` tipos de dados, utilize o <xref:System.DateTime>Escreva e aplicar a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>com o tipo de dados definido como "data" ou "tempo".</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> </xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: For every XML Schema data type that is mapped to a string, apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute> with its DataType property set to the XML Schema type.
trans-unit.target: Para cada tipo de dados de esquema XML que está mapeado para uma cadeia, aplique o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>com a propriedade de tipo de dados definida para o tipo de esquema XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapElementAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Note that this does not change the serialization format, only the schema for the member.
trans-unit.target: Tenha em atenção que isto não se altera o formato de serialização, apenas o esquema para o membro.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The property is case-sensitive, so you must set it exactly to one of the XML Schema data types.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > A propriedade é maiúsculas e minúsculas, pelo que deve defini-lo exatamente a um dos tipos de dados de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Passing binary data as an XML element is more efficient than passing it as an XML attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Transmitir dados binários como um elemento XML é mais eficiente do que passou-a como um atributo XML.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML data types, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) document, "XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes".
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre os tipos de dados XML, consulte o documento de Consortium World Wide Web (www.w3.org), "XML esquema parte 2: tipos de dados".

trans-unit.source: |XSD data type|.NET data type| |-------------------|--------------------| |anyURI|<xref:System.String>| |base64Binary|Array of <xref:System.Byte> objects| |boolean|<xref:System.Boolean>| |byte|<xref:System.SByte>| |date|<xref:System.DateTime>| |dateTime|<xref:System.DateTime>| |decimal|<xref:System.Decimal>| |double|<xref:System.Double>| |ENTITY|<xref:System.String>| |ENTITIES|<xref:System.String>| |float|<xref:System.Single>| |gDay|<xref:System.String>| |gMonth|<xref:System.String>| |gMonthDay|<xref:System.String>| |gYear|<xref:System.String>| |gYearMonth|<xref:System.String>| |hexBinary|Array of <xref:System.Byte> objects| |ID|<xref:System.String>| |IDREF|<xref:System.String>| |IDREFS|<xref:System.String>| |int|<xref:System.Int32>| |integer|<xref:System.String>| |language|<xref:System.String>| |long|<xref:System.Int64>| |Name|<xref:System.String>| |NCName|<xref:System.String>| |negativeInteger|<xref:System.String>| |NMTOKEN|<xref:System.String>| |NMTOKENS|<xref:System.String>| |normalizedString|<xref:System.String>| |nonNegativeInteger|<xref:System.String>| |nonPositiveInteger|<xref:System.String>| |NOTATION|<xref:System.String>| |positiveInteger|<xref:System.String>| |QName|<xref:System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName>| |duration|<xref:System.String>| |string|<xref:System.String>| |short|<xref:System.Int16>| |time|<xref:System.DateTime>| |token|<xref:System.String>| |unsignedByte|<xref:System.Byte>| |unsignedInt|<xref:System.UInt32>| |unsignedLong|<xref:System.UInt64>| |unsignedShort|<xref:System.UInt16>|

ENTIDADES | <xref:System.String>| | float | <xref:System.Single>| | gDay | <xref:System.String>| | gMonth | <xref:System.String>| | gMonthDay | <xref:System.String>| | gYear | <xref:System.String>| | <xref:System.Int32>| | número inteiro | <xref:System.String>| | idioma | <xref:System.String>| | longo | <xref:System.Int64>| | Nome | <xref:System.String>| | NCName | <xref:System.String>| | negativeInteger | <xref:System.String>| | NMTOKEN | <xref:System.String>| | NMTOKENS | <xref:System.String>| | normalizedString | <xref:System.String>| | nonNegativeInteger | <xref:System.String>| | | cadeia | <xref:System.String>| | curto | <xref:System.Int16>| | tempo | <xref:System.DateTime>| | token | <xref:System.String>| | unsignedByte | <xref:System.Byte>| | unsignedInt | <xref:System.UInt32>| | unsignedLong | <xref:System.UInt64>| | unsignedShort | trans-unit.source: One of the XML Schema data types.
trans-unit.target: Um dos tipos de dados de esquema XML.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the generated XML element.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do elemento XML gerado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the generated XML element.
trans-unit.target: O nome do elemento XML gerado.

trans-unit.source: The default is the member identifier.
trans-unit.target: A predefinição é o identificador de membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> must serialize a member that has the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:null" name="xsi:null" href=""></xref> attribute set to "1".
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>tem de serializar um membro que tem o <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:null" name="xsi:null" href=""> </xref> atributo definido como "1".</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: The XML schema specification for structures allows an XML document to explicitly signal that an element's content is missing.
trans-unit.target: A especificação de esquema XML para estruturas de permite que um documento XML explicitamente assinalar que o conteúdo de um elemento está em falta.

trans-unit.source: Such an element contains the attribute `xsi:null` set to "1".
trans-unit.target: Essa um elemento contém o atributo `xsi:null` definido como "1".

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the World Wide Web Consortium (www.w3.org) specification named "XML Schema Part 1: Structures".
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a especificação de Consortium World Wide Web (www.w3.org) com o nome "XML esquema parte 1: estruturas".

trans-unit.source: If the IsNullable property is set to `true`, the `xsi:null` attribute is generated for class members that have been set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade IsNullable estiver definida como `true`, a `xsi:null` atributo é gerado para membros de classe que foram definidos para `null`.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set a field named `MyStringArray` to `null`, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates the following XML code.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se definir um campo com o nome `MyStringArray` para `null`, a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>gera o seguinte código XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>

trans-unit.source: ``` <MyStringArray xsi:null = "1" /> ``` If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property is `false`, no XML element is generated.
trans-unit.target: ``` <MyStringArray xsi:null = "1" /> ```Se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>propriedade é `false`, não é gerado nenhum elemento XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You cannot apply the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A> property to a member typed as a value type because a value type cannot contain `null`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não é possível aplicar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>escreveu propriedade para um membro como um tipo de valor, porque não pode conter um tipo de valor `null`.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.IsNullable%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> generates the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:null" name="xsi:null" href=""></xref> attribute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>gera o <xref uid="langword_csharp_xsi:null" name="xsi:null" href=""> </xref> atributo; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>
